level.heading: Duties and responsibilities of General Manager; Washington Convention Center Fund--established; limitation on assets; deposits; expenditures; billings and collections; transfer of excess operating profits; Antideficiency Act applicable; annual audit; report; conflict of interest; annual report; appropriations; merit system inapplicable.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
